Service Details: - Provides safe, respectful and anonymous peer support group for individuals who want to abstain from alcohol or other addictive substances- Anyone who wants to work toward becoming and staying alcohol and drug free is welcome- Uses the SMART Recovery program, a non-religious alternative to other 12-step programs
Meetings: Tue, 7pm * CNIB Office, 101-1456 St Paul St, KelownaThu, 7pm * Living Positive Resource Centre, 168 Asher Rd, Kelowna
